author: James Tanner
method: Combine all of the ingredients in a bowl and mix thoroughly to combine. Serve on a plate with an extra drizzle of balsamic vinegar.
ingredients: ½ red onion, finely chopped,  1 clove garlic, finely chopped,  ½ beef tomato, de-seeded and finely chopped,  3 mini white pitta breads, torn into small pieces,  2 tbsp canned cooked chickpeas, rinsed and drained,  55g/2oz spinach leaves,  2 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar, plus extra to serve,  6 fresh basil leaves, torn
